ygData.subject: Re: Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I put all my extras into the trade skills.  When my character is an all-powerful monk, I want to be able and go Bake some neat stuff, brew some strong
ygData.messageBody:
Jacob Jensen wrote:

> If I were you, I'd save them for Feign Death at level 17.
>
> Anyone but me that feels skill points are pretty useless for monks?
> Hehe, I mean, after you get feign death, how many skills are left? 4?
> 5? And most, if not all, monk skills are used in combat constantly, so
> they'll max out by themselfs.
>
> *shrug* Might just be me...

I put all my extras into the trade skills. When my character is an all-powerful monk, I want to be able and go Bake some neat stuff, brew some strong drinks, make some armor (maybe weapons by then)
for wandering travellers, sell reinforced leather to druids, make nice pottery ...

Joram
11th Circle
Povar
